message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I'm really interested in the product, but $130 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?

I understand that $130 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy having this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?
I'm not willing to go as low as $115, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $122. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $118?
